Question: Unmarked works are assumed to have been written by this person.
Hints: Perictione gave birth to Pyrilampes' second son, Antiphon, the half-brother of this person, who appears in Parmenides.
According to Seneca **** died at the age of 81 on the same day he was born.
According to another biographer of him, Neanthes, this person was eighty-four years of age at his death.
